channel.title: Project-Relapse ll Brand New ll 24-7 ll Join now!
channel.description:
[size=16pt]Welcome to Project-Relapse 317![/size] We are a brand new Private Server looking to start a community. Project-Relapse has been Offline in development for the past couple months now, and ive finally decided i want to start hosting it today. Keep in mind we are a brand new server so, not everything will be perfect & everything. you know? But what i can assure you is that if there are any bugs/glitches found, they will be fixed ASAP. No questions asked. Also since we are still new, i can almost garantee you there will be updates daily to improve the server & hopefully grow! But you prolly dont want to read an entire page.. so im just going to cut to the point. I Hope to see you in-game! Thanks for reading!! - Kush
[size=12pt]~Links~[/size]
Website/Forums: http://projectrelapse.createaforum.com/index.php
Client Download: http://uppit.com/8ivjaz81ph7n/Project_Relapese_Client.rar **READ THE "Read me" FILE FIRST!!!** ***Since this is in BETA there is no Auto-Downloading cache.. :(*** ****^^ That option will be added in the near future though!! Same goes with a Webclient!****
First two people on will get a Present!! :)
[size=12pt]~Some Features of the Server~[/size] - Custom & unique home area :) - 15+ Bosses found in-game - 35+ Loyalty titles to choose from! - Double XP every single Weekend!! - Working lootshare and clan chats - Mostly all skills are fully working - Full pk-point system & Shops - If you die outside the wilderness you won't lose any items - Dicebag for Donators Only. - Working turmoil! - Many shops made for in-game balance - Basic mini-games such as barrows, pest control, etc.. - Advanced mini-games such as Castle wars, Ice Path, etc.. - Unique Donator zone & Awesome donor options! - Active Owner, Online & playing with players all the time! - Servers online 24/7!! So what are you waiting for? - Drop on in and give us a chance!!
~Some Bosses~ - Nomad - Phoenix - Bork - Both Avatar Boss's - Giant Mole - +MUCH More
~Some Minigames~ - Castle Wars - Fight Pits - Barrows - Pest Control - Ice Path - + More
[size=12pt]~*Some* Images of the Server~ ~~I will be uploading more Soon! :)~~[/size]
Home area: [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/akx2eb.png[/img]
Pk-Point Shops: [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/w2d6c1.png[/img]
Nomad: [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/j16n9x.png[/img]
Server Information (quest tab): [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/16c3pcy.png[/img]
Loyalty Titles for Every player rank: [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/f5660z.png[/img]
Avatar Boss's: [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/mrrac4.png[/img]

item.title: Project-Relapse ll Brand New ll 24-7 ll Join now!
item.dc:creator: @blazeitup blazeitup
item.description:
@blazeitup wrote:

[size=16pt]Welcome to Project-Relapse 317![/size]
We are a brand new Private Server looking to start a community. Project-Relapse has been Offline in development for the past couple months now, and ive finally decided i want to start hosting it today. Keep in mind we are a brand new server so, not everything will be perfect & everything. you know? But what i can assure you is that if there are any bugs/glitches found, they will be fixed ASAP. No questions asked. Also since we are still new, i can almost garantee you there will be updates daily to improve the server & hopefully grow! But you prolly dont want to read an entire page… so im just going to cut to the point. I Hope to see you in-game!
Thanks for reading!!

  • Kush

[size=12pt]~Links~[/size]

Website/Forums: http://projectrelapse.createaforum.com/index.php

Client Download: http://uppit.com/8ivjaz81ph7n/Project_Relapese_Client.rar
READ THE “Read me” FILE FIRST!!!
Since this is in BETA there is no Auto-Downloading cache…
^^ That option will be added in the near future though!! Same goes with a Webclient!

First two people on will get a Present!!

[size=12pt]~Some Features of the Server~[/size]

  • Custom & unique home area
  • 15+ Bosses found in-game
  • 35+ Loyalty titles to choose from!
  • Double XP every single Weekend!!
  • Working lootshare and clan chats
  • Mostly all skills are fully working
  • Full pk-point system & Shops
  • If you die outside the wilderness you won’t lose any items
  • Dicebag for Donators Only.
  • Working turmoil!
  • Many shops made for in-game balance
  • Basic mini-games such as barrows, pest control, etc…
  • Advanced mini-games such as Castle wars, Ice Path, etc…
  • Unique Donator zone & Awesome donor options!
  • Active Owner, Online & playing with players all the time!
  • Servers online 24/7!! So what are you waiting for?
  • Drop on in and give us a chance!!

~Some Bosses~

  • Nomad
  • Phoenix
  • Bork
  • Both Avatar Boss’s
  • Giant Mole
  • +MUCH More

~Some Minigames~

  • Castle Wars
  • Fight Pits
  • Barrows
  • Pest Control
  • Ice Path
